content: This iconic American fast-food chain was founded by two brothers in San Bernardino, California, in 1940.

You're referring to McDonald's, right? It was indeed founded by Richard and Maurice McDonald in San Bernardino, California, in 1940. However, the franchise we know today was established by Ray Kroc, who joined the company in 1955 and transformed it into a global phenomenon. But if you're thinking of another chain, please let me know!
